title: Monster Apartment - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Artists   Beasts   Cute Protagonist   Demons   Doting Love Interests   Fantasy World   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Strong Love Interests
author: Drunk Long Song   醉饮长歌
description:
Gu Bai carried his drawing board and moved into an incredible apartment building.

He found that the Queen of Toutiao lived on his left, and the veteran celebrity lived on his right. He went out to take an elevator, a supermodel stood on his left, and a gold lawyer on his right.

Across the door lives a financial crocodile who is often scanned in financial magazines.

Many years later, the reporter of S City Daily had the honor to interview Mr. Gu Bai, the famous muralist and lover of the financial crocodile Si Yiming.

“Excuse me, Mr. Gu, what is your biggest gain from this experience of freely falling in love and getting married with Si Dong?”

Gu Bai thought for a while, and replied, “Save the world.”>
